title: mOna gnaana
sahitya:
mOna jnAna muruganait-tenait-tirumAl maruganaik-kOnai
 kuru munikkuru guhanai nI dhyAnam shei manamE dinam dinamE

anupallavi
 
enam inam kaNDariyA shivaperumAnum aDiyEnum kOmAnai

caraNam
 
tIrAttuyaramum tIrttiDum shentiruvODu kalviyum shERndiDum kumArA enamurai
ArttiDum kavi kunjaradAsan kuDi kAttiDum ghana
